casson_walker module¶

casson_walker.casson_walker(C)¶

Computes the Casson-Walker invariant of a Seifert fibered space specified by a definite plumbing.

Parameters

C (list[int]) – Coefficients specifying a definite plumbing.

Returns

The Casson-Walker invariant of the Seifert fibered space.

Return type

sym.Rational

casson_walker.dedekind_sum(m, n)¶

Computes the Dedekind sum s(m,n).

Parameters

  • m (int) – The first parameter of s(m,n), a non-zero integer.

  • n (int) – The second parameter of s(m,n), a non-zero integer.

Returns

The Dedekind sum s(m,n).

Return type

sym.Rational

casson_walker.casson_walker_lens(p, q)¶

Computes the Casson-Walker invariant of the lens space L(p,q), for p and q coprime.

Parameters

  • p (int) – The first parameter of L(p,q), a non-zero integer.

  • q (int) – The second parameter of L(p,q), a non-zero integer.

Returns

The Casson-Walker invariant of L(p,q).

Return type

sym.Rational

casson_walker.casson_walker_prism(p, q)¶

Computes the Casson-Walker invariant of the prism manifold P(p,q), for p and q coprime.

Parameters

  • p (int) – The first parameter of P(p,q), an integer greater than 1 in absolute value.

  • q (int) – The second parameter of P(p,q), a non-zero integer.

Returns

The Casson-Walker invariant of P(p,q).

Return type

sym.Rational

SoaPy
